metadata.name: Both Sides Of The Mirror - Music Video
metadata.description:
Music video for the track "Both Sides Of The Mirror" from the album Endless Experiment (Volume 1). Commercial use rights included below.

Lyrics:  

Fell through the looking glass.  
Failed to establish contact.  
Thoughts shuffled, tossed about.  
And now I’m never goin’ back.

Shadows shifting everywhere.  
Like a sleep demon, hard-pressed.  
A shard of mirror in my hands.  
Slice through the fabric, earn my rest.

It’s only in your dreams,  
Half as real as it seems…  
It’s only in your dreams,  
Half as real as it seems…  
Now take the glass again,  
Take the glass again.  
You're fighting for your sleep,  
You're fighting for your sleep.

White Rabbit, off again.  
He knows what his time is worth.  
Late again, force of habit.  
Rollin' heads and an empty purse.

Soft pelt, swaddles the heart.  
Bears the chill of a broken window.  
Yanks blinds to cut the light off.  
Strings black thread like the widow.

It’s only in your dreams,  
Half as real as it seems…  
It’s only in your dreams,  
Half as real as it seems…  
Now take the glass again,  
Take the glass again.  
You're fighting for your sleep,  
You're fighting for your sleep.

We’re both haunted…  
Both sides of the mirror…  
Both showing what the other fears…  
Both reaching at a wheel to steer…

A body….long in motion…. 

---Both Sides Of The Mirror---

The Known Factory is the work of musician Known Fact. The 1/1 series is for special releases - music videos, exclusive or commissioned works, or even special art or items used by the artist himself. While most music releases come through the 1155 contract, sometimes an experiment is only meant for one destination. This 721 contract contains the same set of commercial use rights as the 1155n

Grant of Rights, Limitations, and Warranties:  
  
1. The Copyright Owner of the Works remains the copyright owner. The Grantee is not receiving copyright ownership of the Works but is receiving certain limited rights in the Works as set forth herein.  

2. Upon confirming the NFT on the blockchain, Buyer becomes the Grantee and immediately receives a worldwide, non-exclusive, transferable license to the Works as set forth herein, for the period the Grantee owns the NFT. 

3. Grantee is granted the right to use, copy and display the Works.  
  
4. Grantee may modify the works, create derivative works, transform the works or perform the Works with attribution to the Copyright Owner and Creator.  

5. Grantee may make commercial use of the Works with attribution to the Copyright Owner and the Creator. The NFT will need to be verified on the blockchain in the possession of the Grantee at time of commercial publication.  
  
6. Any exercise of right granted hereunder requires attribution to the Copyright Owner and the Creator if they are listed in the NFT sale, where reasonably possible.  
  
7. Grantee shall not challenge Licensor’s copyright ownership of the Works.  
  
8. The NFT Seller warrants they are authorized to license the Works and consistent with these terms.
